dublin_core.dcvalue: This slide deck contains presentations from the May 28 2013 meeting of the mHealth Working Group on Mobile Money for Health All of the presentations are included here with the exception of one by Meneske Gencer which is available as a recording see Menekse Gencer mPay Connect How can mobile money improve health outcomes The presentations included here are Pamela Riley HFG project Setting the contextAndrew Karlyn USAID Mobile Solutions Why does mobile money matter Steve Ollis D Tree Zanzibar use case for safer deliveriesJudy Gold Marie Stopes International Madagascar family planning voucher use caseHamilton McNutt NetHope Tools to support transition to mobile money
